channel.title: Wondering how to make a safepk? And problem with runserver
channel.description:
Hi, well I was wondering how to make a safepk where you dont lose your items but you do receive pkpoints.... Also my server is messed up it says this whe nI run server, "Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException 16 AtItemHandler.loaditemlist>itemhandler.java: 316 and other stuff can some1 please help me I promise admin/co-owner
Note: Yes I have ran my server before like 2 days ago it was working fine and when I came back and tried to run I got this message

item.title: Wondering how to make a safepk? And problem with runserver

Hi, well I was wondering how to make a safepk where you dont lose your items but you do receive pkpoints… Also my server is messed up it says this whe nI run server,
